item.title: Building Fast Serverless APIs With Minimal APIs on AWS Lambda
item.description: Learn how to deploy ASP.NET Core Minimal APIs to AWS Lambda with just one library and a single line of code. We'll explore the setup process, measure real-world performance including cold start times, and discuss when serverless makes sense for your APIs. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/building-fast-serverless-apis-with-minimal-apis-on-aws-lambda
